channel.title: Alcohol Inks on Nancy's Creative Mess
channel.description: Recent content in Alcohol Inks on Nancy's Creative Mess

item.title: *Addicted to CAS #229*
item.description: We’re back with another Addicted to CAS challenge… Just a quick post for me before I head off to work. I usually do my blogging on Wednesday mornings before work and I lost Wednesday morning to Urgent Care (see yesterdays post) so I am feeling more than a little behind! Card Info *Cardstock: Yupo *Images: Studio Katia Birthday Greetings *Ink: Versafine Clair Nocturne; Tim Holtz Alcohol Inks in Raspberry, Glacier, Alchemy (pearl)

item.title: *Blue Ink*
item.description: I had my first session at physical therapy yesterday and while things are better than they had been, I still feel like there is a very long way to go before this injury is a thing of the past. I will be working on stretches and trying to use my right hand/arm/wrist as normally as possible. There is still some swelling and the joint is extremely stiff. I’m feeling a little discouraged as I write this because I just want this whole thing to be a memory.

item.title: *Addicted to CAS #220*
item.description: Challenge #220 at Addicted to CAS is all about flowers…. we can’t wait to see your beautiful flower creations! You get a bonus card from me today…. I created my alcohol ink background and fit two flower dies on it … and since they are so similar I decided to share them both in one post I really hope you’ll play along and share your cards HERE!
